name: Catherna's Destiny
description:
Embark on a journey through a surreal, postmodern world in our quirky RPG. Navigate a twisted, alternate reality where the laws of physics and reality are constantly in flux. Explore a beautifully rendered, hand-drawn landscape, filled with unexpected surprises and mind-bending vistas. Meet a cast of eccentric and offbeat characters, each with their own story to tell. With a mix of dark humor and a hint of nostalgia, this RPG will take you on a trip you won't soon forget.

It is a sister game to the upcoming Piero's Pilgrimage.

Add Piero's Pilgrimage to the wishlist on steam: 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1948390/Pieros_Pilgrimage
